recommendations: Omprakash Jangid “I highly recommend Vishal toshniwal, my B.Tech graduation friend from MLV Textile and Engineering College. Vishal has great technical skills and works very hard. He is very good at finding smart solutions to problems. He is a great team leader, communicate well, and help create a positive work environment. Vishal is always eager to learn and grow. They will be a valuable addition to any team, and I am excited to see what they achieve next. Best regards, Om”

Dr. Parul Singh “Vishal has been an exceptional student in my class, known for his sincerity, hard work and bright intellect. He possesses remarkable analytical skills and an impressive ability to solve problems efficiently. Throughout the course, Vishal consistently demonstrated a diligent approach, submitting projects of outstanding quality. He not only excels individually but also proves to be an invaluable team player, making substantial contributions to group project reports and presentations. Additionally, Vishal possesses excellent communication skills, ensuring effective and clear interactions with his peers and instructors. He is highly punctual and maintains a focused mindset, consistently delivering tasks on time and with utmost dedication. I firmly believe that Vishal's impressive qualities, including his communication skills, punctuality, and focus, make him an invaluable asset for any prospective employer.”
